body_html: I think we should allow people to put modules multiple times inside a single container. It's very easy to make parameters() be a unique iterator, and this is actually the only issue we're having with this approach,

body: I think we should allow people to put modules multiple times inside a single container. It's very easy to make `parameters()` be a unique iterator, and this is actually the only issue we're having with this approach,
